title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta. Mix eggs and parmesan. Combine all with the pasta and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices. Grill the chicken. Prepare the sauce. Combine chicken with sauce and simmer.
